title: Free Blue Watch Face

descriptionHTML:
Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Free Blue Watch Face is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.
Vivid color and beautiful design are the main characteristics for our latest Watch Face. Try it , you will definitely fall in love with it's design. Download now Free Blue Watch Face and have fun.
How to setup Free Blue Watch Face:
★ Install Android Wear first!
★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.
★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Free Blue Watch Face.
★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.
★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!
We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered!
Features:
★ Designed by professional artists !
★ Battery friendly !
★ Easy installing process
★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices
★ Analog display
★ New beautiful themes every day !!!
You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Free Blue Watch Face app settings menu.
Free Blue Watch Face is compatible with:
★ ASUS ZENWATCH
★ LG G WATCH R
★ MOTO 360
★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3
★ LG G WATCH
★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!
★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!


Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! Also, if you have any suggestions on how we can improve your experience or if you would like to see a particular watch face with some specific design please write us at the e-mail address: watchfacebytme@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important for us.
comments: Love this on Huawei watch Just wish it had battery meter. But is my favorite on my Huawei watch.
Not in sync with motor 360 Watch face does not line well with 360
Blue watch face Couldn't get the app to sync with my phone?
recentChanges: Updated to support Moto 360 ambidextrous feature.
